content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- 3 Steam engines at positions (x1, y1), (x2, y2), (x3, y3) - currently not specified in logs.
- 1 Boiler at position (x4, y4) - currently not specified in logs.
- 1 Offshore pump at position (x5, y5) - currently not specified in logs.

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (x1, y1), (x2, y2), (x3, y3) - currently not specified in logs.
- 3 Furnaces at positions (x4, y4), (x5, y5), (x6, y6) - currently not specified in logs.

### Copper cable factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- 1 Assembling machine at position (x1) and inserter at position (y1) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position (x4) to the assembling machine at position (x1).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft or use entities that require inputs. Check your inventory regularly to avoid running out of materials. 

### Errors related to entity status
- Regularly check the status of your furnaces and other entities to ensure they have the necessary ingredients and power to function properly.
